author: Brian Kramer
description: Rich Presence for games on Discord.
name: DiscordRich

releases.message:
## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:

https://github.com/subsoap/discordrich/archive/v1.0.5.zip

## Fixes

* Fix DLIB_LOG_DOMAIN preprocessor warning

## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:

https://github.com/subsoap/discordrich/archive/v1.0.4.zip

## Fixes

* Disable extension on Windows 7 until a bug that prevents the game's shutdown is fixed.

## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:

https://github.com/subsoap/discordrich/archive/v1.0.3.zip

## Fixes

* Fix Android, iOS, HTML builds

## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:

https://github.com/subsoap/discordrich/archive/v1.0.2.zip

## Fixes

* Make run-in-editor fix backwards-compatible with older editors

## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:

https://github.com/subsoap/discordrich/archive/v1.0.1.zip

## Fixes

* Fix run-in-editor detection on macOS on Defold 1.2.144

Initial release

## Dependency URL:

Add this to your `game.project`:
